name: Validate browsing through the megamenu to land on CLP or PLP

steps.name: Given Guest User should be on michaels home page
When the user navigates through megamenu
Then the user lands on CLP or PLP for Tier1
And the user lands on CLP or PLP for Tier2
And the user lands on CLP or PLP for Tier3
